dish_name: Curry Laksa Noodles With Crispy Tofu
description: This laksa noodle soup is a delicious spicy, creamy broth made with coconut milk and plenty of spices, served with flat rice noodles, crispy tofu, and your toppings of choice.
ingredients: [{"name": "coconut milk", "units": "can", "amount": 1}, {"name": "flat rice noodles", "units": "g", "amount": 500}, {"name": "vegetable stock", "units": "ml", "amount": 200}, {"name": "tofu", "units": "g", "amount": 400}, {"name": "oil", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "cumin", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "cornflour", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "bean sprouts", "units": "g", "amount": 100}, {"name": "tenderstem broccoli", "units": "g", "amount": 200}, {"name": "crispy onions", "units": "tablespoon", "amount": 4}, {"name": "cilantro", "units": "g", "amount": 20}, {"name": "white onion", "units": null, "amount": 1}, {"name": "garlic", "units": "cloves", "amount": 2}, {"name": "fresh ginger", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "lemongrass", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "galangal paste", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "paprika", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "tumeric", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 2}, {"name": "ground cumin", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "ground coriander", "units": "teaspoon", "amount": 1}, {"name": "green chilli", "units": null, "amount": 1}]
instructions: 1) Prepare your tofu. Chop your tofu into cubes, then add to a bag with a heaped tablespoon of cornflour, salt, pepper, and a sprinkle of cumin powder. Bake for 15 - 20 minutes or air fry for 10 minutes at 200C. 2) Make the laksa paste by blending onion, garlic, ginger, galangal paste, lemongrass, sesame oil, and seasonings into a smooth paste. 3) Heat the paste in a pan for 2-3 minutes, then add coconut milk and vegetable stock, simmer for 10-15 minutes. 4) Prepare toppings while the soup simmers. 5) Assemble by adding cooked noodles to bowls, ladling over soup, and topping with tofu and other toppings.
notes: The laksa paste will keep in the fridge in an airtight container for up to 5 days.
